{{ddcl|since=c++23|
constexpr std::iter_const_reference_t&lt;Iter&gt; operator[]( difference_type n ) const
    requires std::random_access_iterator&lt;Iterator&gt;;
}}

Returns a reference to the element at specified relative location.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|n|position relative to current location}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
A reference-to-const to the element at relative location, that is, {{c|static_cast&lt;std::iter_const_reference_t&lt;Iter&gt;&gt;(base()[n])}}.
